definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The rotating sphere shows the current pitch and bank angles.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉的球體表示了當前的俯仰角和坡度角。

sentences.english: The hill was so steep that the old bicyle had difficulty getting up.
sentences.chinese: 山坡度太陡，這輛舊自行車爬上去很困難。

sentences.english: The stands at the sports ground rake steeply.
sentences.chinese: 運動場的看臺坡度很大。

sentences.english: The aspect and slope of wasteland are important factors affecting plant colonization.
sentences.chinese: 廢棄地的坡向和坡度也是影響植物定居的重要因子。

sentences.english: In addition, it does not impose any limitation on the sloped angle of the trapezoid.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法可以應用於梯形斜邊任意坡度角的情況。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the large slope of the seat design allows unimpeded view of each audience.
sentences.chinese: 同時，大坡度的座位設計使得每個觀衆的視野無阻礙。

sentences.english: You can better simulate outdoor running by setting your treadmill at 1% incline.
sentences.chinese: 你可以設定跑步機1%的坡度更好地模擬室外跑。

sentences.english: The road stretches uphill at a steep slope.
sentences.chinese: 這條路以陡峭的坡度向山上延伸。

sentences.english: All terrain car able to descend slopes up to 65 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 能適應任意地形的車子可以在65度的坡度上行駛。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the transverse section measuring method of the large slope inclined shaft construction gauge of a project in Hainan province.
sentences.chinese: 介紹海南某工程大坡度斜井淨空斷面測量方法。

sentences.english: The railway slopes up slightly at this point.
sentences.chinese: 鐵路從這裏開始有個微微向上的坡度。

sentences.english: It could be a swerve from a steep and quiet stretch of road.
sentences.chinese: 它可以是一段坡度陡峭但安靜公路的急轉彎。

sentences.english: A contrast analysis of slopes extracted by different algorithms based on DEM.
sentences.chinese: 自DEM由不同算法提取坡度的對比分析。

sentences.english: The distribution along altitude and slope also existed among dominate species of each synusia on southern aspect.
sentences.chinese: 陽坡羣落各層片優勢種還存在海拔和坡度分佈格局。

sentences.english: The approximate theory which applies to water tables of low slope is due to Dupuit.
sentences.chinese: 應用於低坡度水面的近似理論來自於裘不依。

sentences.english: The sloping terrain allowed for construction of a building on two levels, each with direct access to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 有坡度的地形使得建築上下兩層都能直接連向地面。

definition: dip/angle of dip (inclination of a geological plane down from horizontal)/tilt (inclination of ship from vertical)
uphill/upslope/to move upwards/to climb a slope
